mapper.insert: INSERT INTO viomi_b2b_processlog( interface_name, info_json, process_comment, process_flag, process_time, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, quarter ) VALUES ( #{interfaceName}, #{infoJson}, #{processComment}, #{processFlag}, #{processTime}, #{createById}, #{createDt}, #{updateById}, #{updateDt}, #{quarter} )
